title: How do we comment on articles in the forum after we read it? When I click on discuss, there is no way to find it....
text:
StarNewsOnline.com has no way to directly comment on articles

If you click on the link at the end of an article that says 'discuss
this article in our forums,' it takes you to the forum homepage

If you want to discuss articles on StarNewsOnline.com, you can go to
the Article forum, and create a new thread.
